mapper.sql: report_id, unit_id, user_score, illustrate, CREATED_USER, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_TIME, DEL
mapper.select: select count(*) from file_info where biz_id in(select report_id from indicator_report where unit_id=#{unit_id})
select * from indicator_report where report_Status=2 and unit_id=#{unitId}
select * from indicator_report where report_Progress=3 and report_status=1

select sum(a.user_score) from indicator_report a left join assessment_indicators b on a.indicators_id=b.indicators_id where b.assessment_Year=#{assessmentYear} and a.unit_id=#{unitId} and b.indicators_name!='绩效减分'

select count(b.FILE_ID) from indicator_report a left join file_info b on a.report_id=b.biz_Id where
a.report_Progress> 0
a.report_Progress> 1
a.report_Status= 2
and a.unit_Id= #{unitId}

select sum(b.fraction) from indicator_report a left join assessment_indicators_detail b on a.detail_id=b.detail_id left join assessment_indicators c on c.indicators_id=b.indicators_id where a.unit_id=#{unitId} and c.assessment_year=#{year} and c.indicators_name !='绩效减分'

select c.* from indicator_report a left join assessment_indicators_detail b on a.detail_id=b.detail_id left join assessment_indicators c on c.indicators_id=b.indicators_id where a.report_id =#{reportId}

select count(*) from indicator_report a left join assessment_indicators b on b.indicators_id=a.indicators_id left join audit_log c on c.report_id=a.report_id where b.assessment_year =#{year} and a.unit_id=#{unitId} and c.indicators_status=1

select count(a.report_id) from indicator_report a where
a.report_Progress> 0
a.report_Progress> 1
a.report_Status= 2
and a.unit_Id= #{unitId}

select count(a.report_id) from indicator_report a left join assessment_indicators_detail c on a.detail_id=c.detail_id left join assessment_indicators d on c.task_id=d.indicators_id where
a.report_Progress> 0
a.report_Progress>1
a.report_Progress>= 2
a.report_Progress>=3
and a.unit_Id= #{unitId}
and d.unit_Id= #{expertUnit}
